Types

Type definitions used for Functional Coverage in func_cov_pkg.

t_report_verbosity

NON_VERBOSE, VERBOSE, HOLES_ONLY

t_rand_weight_visibility

SHOW_RAND_WEIGHT, HIDE_RAND_WEIGHT

t_coverage_type

BINS, HITS, BINS_AND_HITS

t_overall_coverage_type

COVPTS, BINS, HITS

t_rand_sample_cov

SAMPLE_COV, NO_SAMPLE_COV

t_new_bins_acceptance

NO_ALERT_ON_NEW_BINS, WARNING_ON_NEW_BINS, ERROR_ON_NEW_BINS
